claim_summary: A national HCBS reimbursement comparison lists Arkansas rates: personal care $18.00 per hour, home‑delivered meals $5.97 per meal, personal emergency response monitoring $1.07 per day, adult day services $10 per hour, in‑home respite $18 per hour, short‑term facility respite $6.72 per hour and long‑term respite $2.24 per hour【415148646089510†L42-L149】.

source.title: Comparison of Home‑ and Community‑Based Services Reimbursement Rates Across States
